name: Gladiator
description: A highly trained warrior clad in armor, wielding weapons such as swords or spears, known for its impressive combat skills.
memorable: The Gladiator's ability to perform breathtaking displays while fighting, captivating audiences and intimidating foes.
goals: To fight for glory, fame, or survival in arenas.
relations: May fight alongside or against other gladiators, or be controlled by masters of arenas.
environment: Typically found in arenas or battlefields.
strengths: Excels in both melee and ranged combat, employing tactical thinking during fights and possessing high Strength and Constitution.
weaknesses: Reliance on melee combat makes it vulnerable to ranged attackers.
attacks: Employs devastating melee attacks, including spear thrusts and shield bashes, capable of knocking opponents prone.
most_powerful_ability: Brutal, allowing it to deal one extra die of damage when hitting with a melee weapon.
equipment: Equipped with a spear, shield, and protective armor.
senses: Passive Perception of 11, indicating average awareness.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, Intimidation, and Performance, showcasing its combat prowess and charisma in social interactions.
additional_information: Can use Multiattack to strike multiple times in a turn.
Capable of performing entertaining displays to charm or frighten foes.
Has an ability called Shield Block to enhance its defense against attacks.
Shows strong resistance against being frightened due to its Brave trait.
Can knock smaller foes prone with its Shield Bash.
